titles.title: 365 Jesus Jesus Jesus (jumps around a bit)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus Jesus Jesus
Sweetest Name on earth
How can I a sinner
Come to know its worth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh the sinful sorrow
Oh the strangest shame
That I saw no beauty
In that sacred name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Never felt the sweetness
Never knew the grace
Never saw the love-pain
In that wounded face

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Never found the mystry
In that simple word
Jesus Jesus Jesus
Savior - Lover - Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Now 'tis past and over
Gone my sin and shame
Jesus Jesus did it
Glory to His Name

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I have seen the glory
Of His tender face
I have felt with wonder
Thrills of holy grace

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Wonderful compassion
Reaching even me
Bows my humbled spirit
In captivity

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Jesus Jesus Jesus
Loved me in my shame
Oh the joy and rapture
Of that sacred Name
